localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
I just got a bagel with cream cheese for $3.50.

Unbelievable. I remember when the dollar used to mean something.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
我刚花3.5美元买了一个奶油芝士百吉饼。

难以置信。我记得当美元曾经有意义的时候。

我剛花3.5美元買了一個奶油芝士百吉餅。

難以置信。我記得當美元曾經有意義的時候。

previous.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
previous.title: 👋 FavEmoji – Copy & Paste Emojis - Save Emojis as favorites. Perfect to create ads/text/design.

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一个网站，允许你保存表情符号作为收藏夹，让他们总是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需点击复制和粘贴到你需要的地方。例如轻松创建广告、文本、设计。
localize.tagline: 将表情符号保存为收藏夹。完美的创建广告/文本/设计。
